::: {.unit-reading}
# Reading

## Installation

Download Julia from the official site or use the Juliaup installer. Juliaup simplifies version management and updates.

## Start the REPL

Open a terminal and type julia. You should see the Julia prompt. Try a simple expression like 2 + 2 to confirm it runs.

## Check your version

Run versioninfo() to see details about your installation. This is helpful when diagnosing issues.

## Editors and scripts

While you can use the REPL for quick checks, most work happens in scripts or notebooks. An IDE such as Positron or VS Code gives you a better workflow.

::: 
<!-- end unit-reading div -->
